phrases: I beg you, please tell me
Why do people fight and hurt each other
What can you see from your field?
Why cannot people forgive each other
The rain passed, and summer took on blue hues
When your friends wilt around you
With your leaves unable to speak
Summer's sun clouded over, the wind streamed by
I shall sing the proof that you lived
For the sake of those who have no names
I am in charge of key animation for the Guilty Crown: Lost Christmas PC game.
I am in charge of key animation for the Guilty Crown: Lost Christmas PC game.
We will meet up in thirty seconds.
Now get that to Gai, quick!
What is the huge yawn for?
Were you surfing the net or something?
Lots of them out today, huh?
Did not you see the news?
Apparently there was some terrorist attack or something yesterday.
In Odaiba... no, I guess it is called Ward 24 now.
Oh, sorry, I am not done with that video for the competition yet.
I did not come to harp on you about it...
I will get it done by the deadline, do not worry.
He says he can do it, after all.
Okay, we are counting on you!
I think I am trying hard to be socially perceptive here.
Maybe it is true that my mind works out of step with everyone else's.
It is just that I do not know what to say to other people.
So I hide my nervousness and go along with what they say.
that is how I have made the quasi-friendships in my life.
Right now, Japan operates as a quasi-independent nation.
That is what my mom says.
Ten years ago, the Apocalypse Virus pandemic wreaked havoc on this country,
and we relied on an unbelievable amount of help from many other countries.
And we are still dependent on them even now.
Japan's foundations are just barely holding together.
We cannot leave this to you.
You do not have the power to protect the people who are important to you.
But... should we really just accept that?
Is not there something more that I can do?
I beg you, please tell me,
Why do people fight and hurt each other?
Um, you have got the wrong idea!
I totally did not want to
It... it is not done yet!
It is a view of my hometown, and
Um, would you like a rice ball?
London Bridge is falling down, falling down, falling down.
Um, you are Inori, are not you?
Bridge is falling down, my fair lady.
London Bridge is falling down, falling down, falling down.
So, what are you doing here?
No, more importantly, why are you so hurt?
We have to get this to Gai.
You might be able to do it if you try.
But you will never be able to if you do not.
Ouma Shu... are you a coward?
If you defend her, we will purge you too, as her accomplice.
What does the data check show?
She is definitely a member of the Funeral Parlor in Rappongi.
Should I really just accept this?
Should I really just accept this?
I felt... a little relieved, because I was not in danger anymore.
That is how pathetic I am.
When you get right down to it, she was way out of my league.
I wanted to get close to her, and touch her hand!
Rest a while, and you will be fine.
After that, just go back to your normal self.
We have to get this to Gai.
You are telling me to go there?
This might be my last chance to not hate myself.
It had to be here, of all places...
I am told you have dispatched a squadron to Roppongi.
I cannot allow it if it is not for an aid mission.
So, just how dangerous is this stolen Void Genome?
And so you cannot even tell me, GHQ's Supreme Commander?
My Anti Bodies have already apprehended the culprit,
and are searching for the stolen genome as we speak.
Still do not want to talk?
We have been granted the authority to dispose of the diseased without warning.
If you do not tell us where you hid it,
I will just have to purge every single resident of this neighborhood.
All residents in our operating area are designated as Stage IV+ infected.
I hereby authorize infection control measures!
What shall we do with the girl?
After we commence hostilities, get rid of her outside.
Well, no, I do not think it does...
I am very sorry, but it does not belong to me!
She worked so hard to protect this...
The current situation does not allow for your survival.
Do not tell me he is...
What about the girl who was with that?
They are firing live rounds at anybody they see!
Tsugumi, what is the word on Ayase and the others?
Beat it, you are in my way!
Do not you dare let go of that thing!
But... what can I do, exactly?
How many are we up against?
What do you think you are doing?!
Do something that is not like you for once, Shu!
The guilty crown given shape through the bond between hearts.
These days you love me no more
nor am I still treasured by you
What did you tell me when we parted?
The words hung in midair and never reached me
I know my dreams and wishes are illusory
and yet I cannot give up on them
You said, Do not let go, hold onto my hand
and, We will always be together
Your hands as I held them were warm
These days you love me no more
nor am I still treasured by you
What did you tell me when we parted?
The words hung in midair and never reached me
I know my dreams and wishes are illusory
and yet I cannot give up on them
You said, Do not let go, hold onto my hand
and, We will always be together
Your hands as I held them were warm
